taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family ORCHIDACEAE;tribe CRANICHIDEAE;subtribe SPIRANTHINAE;genus Spiranthes;species delitescens;

bio:treatment.discussion: Spiranthes delitescens is an amphiploid product of hybridization of species in the n = 15 and n = 22 lineages. Although its origin is unknown, on morphologic grounds C. J. Sheviak (1990) proposed S. vernalis and S. porrifolia as possible parents.

references.reference: Sheviak, C. J. 1990. A new Spiranthes (Orchidaceae) from the cienegas of southernmost Arizona. Rhodora 92: 213–231.
